exceptions.exn: In environment q : R q' : 1 < q H : R -> Prop Unable to unify "Rabs ?M2363 < 1" with "exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> H x".

In environment H0 : forall q : R, Rabs q < 1 -> is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => q ^ n) 0 q : R q' : 1 < q H : R -> Prop M : R H1 : forall x : R, M < x -> H x Unable to unify "?M2580 < ?M2581" with "exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> (fun x : nat => H ((fun n0 : nat => q ^ n0) x)) n".

In environment H3 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 < r2 -> r2 > r1 H2 : forall q : R, Rabs q < 1 -> is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => q ^ n) 0 q : R q' : 1 < q H : R -> Prop M : R H1 : forall x : R, M < x -> H x Unable to unify "Prop" with "filtermap (fun n : nat => q ^ n) eventually H".

original: intros q H. apply is_lim_seq_geom. unfold Rabs. apply Rlt_gt. apply H.
